attributes.action: raise the issue with the European Council to scrap the 4 days per month plenery sittings at Strasbourg and hold ALL meetings in Brussels to save the running costs of over 120 million euros of EU Tax payers money, improve MEP's efficiency by eliminating the travel between venues and reduce damage to the environment with related travel etc.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: 12 times a year the MEP's migrate from Brussels to Strasbourg to hold a 4 day 'plenery' meeting. This cost us, the taxpayer, more than 120 million euros per year, is rediculous in the extreme when the MEP's have perfectly adequate meeting places in Brussels. Let us get it to stop. If the prime minister will not act then this demonstrates a lack of conscience to our hard earned money and a good reason to seek a different govenment.
